description: A dataset for decision-making in nursery school admissions based on parental and economic factors, applied in education and social services.

variables.meaning: The column 'parents' contains data of type categorical. It represents the parents of the observation.
The column 'has_nurs' contains data of type categorical. It represents the has_nurs of the observation.
The column 'form' contains data of type categorical. It represents the form of the observation.
The column 'children' contains data of type categorical. It represents the children of the observation.
The column 'housing' contains data of type categorical. It represents the housing of the observation.
The column 'finance' contains data of type categorical. It represents the finance of the observation.
The column 'social' contains data of type categorical. It represents the social of the observation.
The column 'health' contains data of type categorical. It represents the health of the observation.
The column 'final evaluation' contains data of type categorical. It represents the final evaluation of the observation.
